name: Aeriality
description:
Fly around a city at sunset! Build up speed while driving, then boost into the sky! Use your wings to maintain control and your grappling hook to efficiently make sharp turns! There is no goal, simply glide and enjoy the sights. Try to find secrets!

This game was developed as the first part of my attempt to release a game every two weeks.

Sound effects are downloaded from freesound.org from these amazing users:

  • MarlonHJ
  • johnnyguitar01
  • zembacraftworks
  • kafokafo
  • cameronmusic
